com.github.macgregor.alexandria.markdown

Class JiveMarkdownConverter

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.macgregor.alexandria.markdown.JiveMarkdownConverter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Context.ContextAware, MarkdownConverter

    public class JiveMarkdownConverter
extends Object
implements MarkdownConverter, Context.ContextAware
    MarkdownConverter implementation to properly format HTML for Jive when custom styling is needed.

        Uses Flexmark to convert markdown to html and resolve relative links to their remote URIs.
        Specified by:
        convert in interface MarkdownConverter
        Parameters:
        metadata - metadata details about the document being converted
        source - absolute path to the markdown source document that is being converted
        converted - absolute path that should be used to write the converted document to
        Throws:
